basic.floral_language:
Alocasia macrorrhizos 
Floriography: sincere, delicate, pure
Alocasia macrorrhizos is from tropical rain forests, water often drips from the tip of leaf blade.
Alocasia macrorrhizos is an evergreen large plant with heart-shaped hypertrophy leaves in emerald green color. In a warm moist environment, water drips from leaf tips. It must be noted that the plant has poisonous, do not have direct contact.
Alocasia macrorrhizos likes half shaded environments, avoid direct sunlight. It flowers sometimes with flowers with spathe in pale yellow or white.
basic.blooming: Foliage plants, blooms sometimes, light green or milky white spathe flower

maintenance.soil: Peat mixed with coarse sand soil
maintenance.sunlight: Like half shade, put in places with scattered light in summer, flowering time needs a period of 3-5h light
maintenance.watering: Likes wet environments, only need keep soil moist, may spray water in the air or rub leaves with water
maintenance.fertilization: Need more fertilization, apply once every 10-15 days in spring and autumn, except winter
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead and yellowish leaves timely
